content.rendered:
Atlan Insight

ATLAN Insight are high endurance autonomous drones capable of flying beyond the horizon to detect, identify and track suspicious activities in real-time, allowing our customers to cost-efficiently make sensitive decisions and protect their marine biodiversity.

Request A Demo

Award winning software

ATLAN Insight for

IUU Fishing Monitoring
Large Marine Debris Detection
Oil Spills Tracking
IMO 2020 Sulfur Emission Reporting
Ocean Search & Rescue (SAR)
Offshore Wind Farms Surveying

The award-winning project aims to help authorities hunt down illegal fishing boats using drones fitted with cameras that can monitor large swathes of water autonomously.

Drones driven by AI will track illegal fishing in African waters.

Overcome VMS & AIS limitations

Monitor the activity of fishing vessels even when they turn off their VMS & AIS devices when entering marine protected areas and restricted zones.

  • Complement the existing tools like AIS and satellite imaging
  • Report illegal activity in real-time regardless of VMS or AIS status.
Learn more

Optimize the human operator’s capabilities

Take full advantage of the drone’s long endurance and have better situational awareness.

  • Fly more than 12 hours per flight
  • Cover more than 20,000 Km2 per flight.
Learn more

Fly beyond the visual line of sight

Through deep neural networks, ATLAN Insight knows what to look for and when to follow, even with limited or no internet access.

  • Detect, identify & track mobile targets
  • Provide legal proof of illegal activity.
Learn more

Comply with privacy regulations

All sensitive non-essential data is deleted by the Al during the flight and no human will have access to it.

  • Automate inflight processing of captured data
  • Eliminate the risk of human tempering
Learn more

Automatic Sense and Avoid for Remotely Piloted Aircraft Systems (RPAS)

Please fill form to download whitepapers

    Situational Assessment

    Receive actionable processed knowledge, anywhere on earth, to make your informed decisions fast.

    Optimized Operations

    Receive actionable processed knowledge, anywhere on earth, to make your informed decisions fast.

    Easy Technical Training

    Receive actionable processed knowledge, anywhere on earth, to make your informed decisions fast.

    Data Protection

    High Precision

    Enhanced Security

    Realtime Awareness

    Swarm Mode

    Large Coverage

    Get in touch with us

    Contact ATLAN Space to :

    • Discuss your business’s challenges and needs
    • Learn more about the cutting-edge technology we offer
    • Know the available drone models & get a quote

      privacy policy*

      Featured in

      As a cutting-edge technology company that develops UAV software, our innovative solutions have been featured in numerous media outlets, from local news stations to prestigious weekly journals.

      Whats’s going on with ATLAN Space?

      ATLAN Insight

      ATLAN Insight estimates the required energy for the drone to get the job done using the calibration procedure at the start of every mission. Moreover, it keeps tabs on energy requirements in real-time during the flight...
      Read More

      Le drone ATLAN Geo

      ATLAN Geo est un drone VTOL à voilure fixe muni d’Intelligence Artificielle qui simplifie et accélère l’exécution des missions de levés topographiques, capture et classifie efficacement les données...
      Read More

      Multi-base RTK+PPK

      ATLAN GEO features 2 multi-band GPS receivers with different antennas for real time accuracy in most use cases. It can be combined with static GPS data for increased centimeter level accuracy. You can make the most of...
      Read More

      Stay up to date

      Subscribe to newsletter for latest news & updates.
